name: places/ChIJdzH8A4hZwokRYOMOXt-6ZD0
adrFormatAddress: 101 Bowery #2, New York, NY 10002-4993, USA

editorialSummary.text: Budget spot in a walk-up building, offering no-frills rooms with shared or private bathrooms.

originalText.text: So I was playing on da hood on my way here and my service was so bad i almost lost a 20 v 2 ( i was the 20 ) anyways when i arrived here the front desk staff was super rude and looked and acted like they reallydont care next up in my room the room was so tiny i couldnt even open my luggage and when i went to my bed there were literally like a million bed bugs and i had to use a plastic bag to get rid of all of them. Next the bathroom shared on the 5th floor is disgusting and there was a poop on the floor and the were was sticked on bloody pads clogged in the toilet absolutely disgusting. Lastly the wifi was so bad I was trying to call my family back home and their faces like morphed into a deformed frog and looks like they were about to throw up and they dont normally look like deformed frogs it was just the wifi. plus when i was trying to do my buisness ( aka poo ) the door wouldnt close and a girl brushing her teeth had to watch me poop and i felt like something come out of the toilet and eat me i just had an unsafe feeling inside of me . and there were NO locks on the rooms

originalText.text: I came to this hotel on a budget as an attempt to relax in San Francisco.  Unfortunately, my room was DISGUSTING.  There was dead skin on the pillow and bedsheet, hair in the shower drain, and BREAST MILK IN THE FRIDGE.  I quickly ran down to the lobby to complain to the workers, when I saw a familiar face, IT WAS JUDE BELLINGHAM!  We both were complaining to the workers about our disgusting rooms when the workers had enough and threw us out!  We were angry and sat on the sidewalk and talked about how rude they were.  We talked for so long it ended up being 12 hours just sitting on the street.  He was so inlove with me that he ended asking me to go on his private jet and to fly me to Madrid.  Little did he know I was texting this weirds 23 year old and he got mad at me because I didn’t answer him for 12 hours.  I said i was asleep because I knew he was jealous of Jude Bellingham. So in the air with Jude, he PROPOSED TO ME!!! Now we’re secretly married and yeah, the weird 23 year old doesn’t know.  don’t go to this hotel unless you want to marry a rich cute celebrity.

originalText.text: This place smells like doodoo. there was monkeys hidden in the shower, grass in my bed, donkeys in the closet, and roaches on the ceiling and the worst part was there was boogers and doodoo in the toilet seat with dead fish in it. and also there was literally a doll under my sheets and made me scream so loud and lastly a little kid ran in my room some how even though the door was locked

originalText.text: Best hotel I've ever stayed at. The bed was so comfortable and the locals made me feel very safe. The one bathroom I shared with the entire floor was very clean and gave a sense of community. I will definitely be staying here again. Also I loved the art on the doors. Very nice.

text.text: Best hotel I've ever stayed at. The bed was so comfortable and the locals made me feel very safe. The one bathroom I shared with the entire floor was very clean and gave a sense of community. I will definitely be staying here again. Also I loved the art on the doors. Very nice.

originalText.text: When I came inside the hotel in the afternoon. The reception guy was stinking! He looks like a homeless man who have been outside for more than 20 years. He is a black man with a blue shirt and black pants and looks filthy. Then when I first check in, he told me to check in at 3 PM because he had to leave. Then after he went, a lady came to the reception and got me my room. I would not go to this place ever again!
